paudgalika ha deshapalana hithawathkam matha sudussan sitiyadi nusudussanta thanathuru labadimen ema aayathanawala siyalu sewawan binda watenawa shri lanka nithignya sangamaye niladhari hamuwedi malwathu - asgiri mahanahimiwaru kiyathi siril wimalasurendra jyeshtayan sitiyadi kanishtayanta menma nusudussanta padawi thananthara ha usas wim labadimen aayathanawala sewawan binda watena athara wiwidha wirodhatha pana nagi athayi malwathu asgiri ubhaya maha nayaka swamindrayan wahanse shri lanka nithignya sangamaye niyojitha pirisak thaman wahanse bahadutu awasthawedi pawasuha.

mahanuwara disthrikkaye nawalapitiya saha thrikunamalaya disthrikkaye kumbaurupitiya chanda madhyasthana this ate chanda wimasima eeye (20) samakamiwa pawathi bawa mathiwarana mahalekam karyalaya pawasayi.me madhyasthana siyallema chandaya pawichchi kirima nawalapitiye 60%k saha kumbaurupitiye 44%k pamana wu bawa pafaral sanwidhanaye widhayaka adhyaksha rohana hettiaarachchi mahatha â€œdinaminataâ€ kiya.aarakshaka katayuthu itha hondin kriyathmaka wu bawath kisidu prachandakari siduwimak wartha nowu bawathchanda nirikshakayan danum dun bawath hettiaarachchi mahatha kiweya.

mokakda ban umbae asundara athdakim anka karana widihata , nikan ayis oo wage , minisa kiyana satha harima amuthuyi machan , umbaa ballo dennekuta , puso dennekuta kanna bonna dila athi kaloth un dennama umbaata dakwana aadaraya eka wage , habayi umbaa bokken kiyala hithana minissu dennek ee wage na aniwaryayen wenas mata oya upadesa dunne samanya pelawath goda giye nathi manussayek , mathata thitha thiyala inna welawaka (bhashawa poddak wenas ) , habayi ee upadesa oonima thanakata sadharana bawa nam mata therila tikak kal .
